about_the_game:
This is a trial version.
Please make sure to check the trial version before purchasing the full version.

Basically, it's made with dots and a resolution of 1280*720.
(There are some parts that are not dots.)
It's an action game with a cute little girl exploring the stage.

Notes
The game is created using Action Game Tucool MV.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. Please make sure to check the trial version.
Please make sure to install DirectX 9.0c.

name: MessiahEnd Refrain Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 8/8.1/10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 8/8.1/10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core(TM) i7 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: This is an action game where a cute girl explores the stage!
